text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet SHINNYQuestionCodesVS

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/CodeSystem/SHINNYQuestionnaires
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    LA33-6Yes
    LA32-8No
    69859-7Do you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs
    96777-8Accountable health communities (AHC) health-related social needs screening (HRSN) tool
    71802-3Housing status
    LA31993-1I have a steady place to live
    LA31994-9I have a place to live today, but I am worried about losing it in the future
    LA31995-6I do not have a steady place to live (I am temporarily staying with others, in a hotel, in a shelter, living outside on the street, on a beach, in a car, abandoned building, bus or train station, or in a park)
    96778-6Problems with place where you live
    LA31996-4Pests such as bugs, ants, or mice
    LA28580-1Mold
    LA31997-2Lead paint or pipes
    LA31998-0Lack of heat
    LA31999-8Oven or stove not working
    LA32000-4Smoke detectors missing or not working
    LA32001-2Water leaks
    LA9-3None of the above
    96779-4Has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home in past 12 months
    LA32002-0Already shut off
    88122-7Within the past 12 months we worried whether our food would run out before we got money to buy more [U.S. FSS]
    LA28397-0Often true
    LA6729-3Sometimes true
    LA28398-8Never true
    88123-5Within the past 12 months the food we bought just didn't last and we didn't have money to get more [U.S. FSS]
    93030-5Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living
    96780-2Wants help finding or keeping work or a job
    LA31981-6Yes, help finding work
    LA31982-4Yes, help keeping work
    LA31983-2I do not need or want help
    96782-8Wants help with school or training
    95618-5Physically hurt you [HITS]
    LA6270-8Never
    LA10066-1Rarely
    LA10082-8Sometimes
    LA16644-9Fairly often
    LA6482-9Frequently
    95617-7Insult you or talk down to you [HITS]
    95616-9Threaten you with physical harm [HITS]
    95615-1Scream or curse at you [HITS]
